item.title: How to not impact your SEO and website traffic when changing WordPress Permalinks
item.description: Having made some changes to your wordpress permalinks, you can easily protect your web site traffic, SEO and search results from Google. This means you and your visitors get no 404 not found error. This wordpress plug-in looks at the incoming link URL structure and then redirects on the fly to the correct post with the new permalink structure. This didn’t make my list of Top 9 WordPress pluginsfor a new install - but if you are migrating a website this is critical.

item.title: 2 Must have Android Apps from Google
item.description: Looking for somewhere to go …. Maybe you need to waste some time or want to find something else to try on your Google Android G1 or HTC Magic. Google obviously has embedded a lot things into the phone - but here are 2 apps that were not installed on the Android phone when you open the box. Places DirectoryPrice FREE Downloads >250,000 updated — 21 Sept -- Even before augmented reality became a buzzword … Google Places Directory was already bringing Google Maps together with GPS / Location Based Services.
